answers.answer: Wow he might get close to 10 pounds...he wont be able to wear many nb clothes.My baby is almost 7 pounds.
I have my baby 4 days ago..when he was born he weight 9pounds.
Your baby is suppose to be that weight right now. Mine at like almost 36 weeks said 5 lbs but I am going to get another ultrasound tuesday to see again the doc thinks I have a huge baby
I have gd and my baby girl weighs 8 pounds already i am 37 weeks 3 days
My doctor didn't act like he was a big baby or anything is he big for 35 weeks?
Does anyone know if 5 pounds 13 ounces is big for 35,weeks pregnant?

If my son continues to gain an ounce a day like he is supposed to he will be 6lbs 1oz at 35 weeks. They said he will be on the big side but not big enough for concern. They also told me that ultrasounds can be a pound or so off. Don't worry momma. I'm sure he is perfectly fine
I would like to know too because I have gestational diabetes and I get another ultrasound at 35 weeks.

I would say that he is normal size. My son weighed 5lbs 4oz at just 33 weeks. Im now 39 weeks and he weighs a little over 7lbs, he's in the 75th percentile. My doctor thought he was going to be over 8lbs. So I would say not to worry, your baby is at a good weight.
When my son was born at 35 weeks he weighed 5lbs 8oz the docs said he was bigger than they expected
Oh gosh I'll be 38 weeks on Monday and my doc said by guessing by my measurements that she is no more than 6 pounds
Yea Shea gonna be witty bitty but I'm okay with that
My daughter was 5 pounds at 29 weeks
I wouldnt worry too much about it. My last baby measured 8lbs 7oz at 36 weeks. At 39 weeks, the day he was born, he measured 9lbs 8oz. He was 8lbs 8oz at birth.
I am 32 weeks I am not sure how much my baby girl weights yet but according to this app that she is 4 pounds so I hope it really is all on track my baby but I go to the doctor next week
@newmomma I am 32 weeks as well but I have gestational diabetes so I'm worried about her weight lok

question: 35 weeks and my baby is 5 pounds 13 ounces. How big do you all think he will be by time he is born? I'm wondering if he will fit newborn wise clothes :) thanks.
title: ohhhh goodnesssssss
